articles.author: Marcia Dunn
articles.title: Strauss’ ‘Blue Danube’ waltz is launching into space to mark his 200th birthday - AP News
articles.description: Strauss' “Blue Danube” waltz is heading into space this month to mark the 200th anniversary of the composer's birth. The European Space Agency's big dish antenna in Spain will beam the waltz into the cosmos as it's performed by the Vienna Symphony Orchestra. …
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) Strauss Blue Danube is heading into space this month to mark the 200th anniversary of the waltz kings birth.
The classical piece will be beamed into the cosmos as its perfo… [+3130 chars]
